page.title: 10 North Gosforth
page.content: There are several other interesting places close to the Gosforth Park Hotel such as Squash Newcastle,a club with over 400 members.There are 6 courts including one which is a glass backed international court.One of our pupils is a member of the club and the U14 county champion.Along the North Road is the Sacred Heart Church,built in 1875 as an Anglican Church and purchased by the Catholics in 1908.At the moment the Church is temporarily closed while restoration work is carried out. A hut has been provided so that the 300 members of the congregation can carry on meeting as usual.People travel from within a radius of 2 miles in order to come to services at the Church and about 50% of these attend regularly. Along Sandy Lane there is an industrial estate with an M.O.T. testing station for heavy goods vehicles.
